cast.overview: After carrying out a flawlessly planned hit, Jef Costello, a contract killer with samurai instincts, finds himself caught between a persistent police investigator and a ruthless employer, and not even his armor of fedora and trench coat can protect him.
cast.title: Le Samouraï

details.biography: André Thorent was born on May 28, 1922 in Salies-du-Salat, Haute-Garonne, France. He was an actor and writer, known for Le Samouraï (1967), Allô police (1966) and Get Out Your Handkerchiefs (1978). He died on March 27, 2015 in Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis, France.
details.name: André Thorent
